summary: Turn from playing the piano to playing with swords, and you will get blood on your hands.
cast: Gabriella Wright|Vincent Perez|Jérémie Renier|Anne Marivin|Aurélien Recoing|Barbara Probst|Françoise Lebrun|Gérald Laroche|Jérôme Bertin|Laurent Schilling|Raphaël Dufour|Hugo Malpeyre|Arnaud Carbonnier|Adeline Zarudiansky|Vincent Ozanon|Serge Chambon|Yasale Oura|Béatrice Agdim|Philippe Morel|Stéphane Comby|Nicolas Besançon|Nicolas Jouret|Pascale Diez|Cécile Lartigue|Guillaume Romain
title: Demain dès l'aube
